content: You'll come back to the path where you first spawn into the level. Fly up and just above the start of the path, where you'll find a curved tree.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Secret Chest'.
The content is as follows:
You'll come back to the path where you first spawn into the level. Fly up and just above the start of the path, where you'll find a curved tree.
